titles.title: Take My Life And Let It Be

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Take my life, and let it be newline Consecrated, Lord, to Thee; newline Take my moments and my days, newline Let them flow with ceaseless praise.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Take my hands, and let them move newline At the impulse of Thy love; newline Take my feet, and let them be newline Swift and beautiful for Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Take my voice, and let me sing newline Always, only, for my King; newline Take my lips, and let them be newline Filled with messages from Thee.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Take my silver and my gold, newline Not a mite would I withhold; newline Take my intellect, and use newline Every power as Thou shalt choose.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Take my will, and make it Thine; newline It shall be no longer mine; newline Take my heart, it is Thine own; newline It shall be Thy royal throne.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Take my love; my Lord, I pour newline At Thy feet its treasure store: newline Take myself, and I will be newline Ever, only, all for Thee.
